verses.text: \w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w* \w looking|strong="G0816"\w* upon \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w council|strong="G4892"\w*, \w said|strong="G3004"\w*: \w Men|strong="G0435"\w*, \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w have|strong="G1473"\w* conversed \w with|strong="G2316"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w good|strong="G0018"\w* \w conscience|strong="G4893"\w* \w before|strong="G3588"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w until|strong="G0891"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w present|strong="G3778"\w* \w day|strong="G2250"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w high|strong="G0749"\w* \w priest|strong="G0749"\w* \w Ananias|strong="G0367"\w* \w commanded|strong="G2004"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w that|strong="G0846"\w* \w stood|strong="G3936"\w* \w by|strong="G3936"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w to|strong="G0846"\w* \w strike|strong="G5180"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w on|strong="G1161"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w mouth|strong="G4750"\w*.

\w Then|strong="G2532"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*: \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w shall|strong="G2532"\w* \w strike|strong="G5180"\w* thee, thou whited \w wall|strong="G5109"\w*. \w For|strong="G4314"\w* sittest thou \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w judge|strong="G2919"\w* \w me|strong="G3004"\w* \w according|strong="G2596"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w law|strong="G3551"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w contrary|strong="G2596"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w law|strong="G3551"\w* commandest \w me|strong="G3004"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w be|strong="G2532"\w* \w struck|strong="G5180"\w*?

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w they|strong="G1161"\w* \w that|strong="G3004"\w* \w stood|strong="G3936"\w* \w by|strong="G3004"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w*: Dost thou \w revile|strong="G3058"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w high|strong="G0749"\w* \w priest|strong="G0749"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*?

\w And|strong="G5037"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w*: \w I|strong="G3754"\w* \w knew|strong="G1492"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w*, \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w he|strong="G3754"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w high|strong="G0749"\w* \w priest|strong="G0749"\w*. \w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w it|strong="G1510"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w written|strong="G1125"\w*: Thou shalt \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w speak|strong="G3004"\w* \w evil|strong="G2560"\w* \w of|strong="G0080"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w prince|strong="G0758"\w* \w of|strong="G0080"\w* thy \w people|strong="G2992"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w* \w knowing|strong="G1097"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w part|strong="G3313"\w* \w were|strong="G1510"\w* \w Sadducees|strong="G4523"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w other|strong="G2087"\w* \w Pharisees|strong="G5330"\w*, \w cried|strong="G2896"\w* \w out|strong="G2896"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w council|strong="G4892"\w*: \w Men|strong="G0435"\w*, \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w am|strong="G1510"\w* \w a|strong="G1510"\w* \w Pharisee|strong="G5330"\w*, \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w son|strong="G5207"\w* \w of|strong="G5207"\w* \w Pharisees|strong="G5330"\w*: \w concerning|strong="G4012"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w hope|strong="G1680"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w resurrection|strong="G0386"\w* \w of|strong="G5207"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w dead|strong="G3498"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w am|strong="G1510"\w* called \w in|strong="G1722"\w* question.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w when|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w had|strong="G3588"\w* \w so|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G2980"\w*, \w there|strong="G1161"\w* \w arose|strong="G1096"\w* \w a|strong="G1096"\w* dissension \w between|strong="G0846"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Pharisees|strong="G5330"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Sadducees|strong="G4523"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w multitude|strong="G4128"\w* \w was|strong="G3588"\w* \w divided|strong="G4977"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Sadducees|strong="G4523"\w* \w say|strong="G3004"\w* \w that|strong="G3004"\w* \w there|strong="G1510"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w no|strong="G3361"\w* \w resurrection|strong="G0386"\w*, \w neither|strong="G3383"\w* \w angel|strong="G0032"\w*, \w nor|strong="G3383"\w* \w spirit|strong="G4151"\w*: \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Pharisees|strong="G5330"\w* \w confess|strong="G3670"\w* \w both|strong="G0297"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w there|strong="G1722"\w* \w arose|strong="G1096"\w* \w a|strong="G1096"\w* \w great|strong="G3173"\w* cry. \w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w some|strong="G5100"\w* \w of|strong="G4151"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Pharisees|strong="G5330"\w* \w rising|strong="G0450"\w* \w up|strong="G0450"\w*, strove, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*: \w We|strong="G3778"\w* \w find|strong="G2147"\w* \w no|strong="G3762"\w* \w evil|strong="G2556"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w man|strong="G0444"\w*. \w What|strong="G3588"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w* \w a|strong="G1096"\w* \w spirit|strong="G4151"\w* hath \w spoken|strong="G2980"\w* \w to|strong="G3004"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w or|strong="G2228"\w* \w an|strong="G1096"\w* \w angel|strong="G0032"\w*?

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w when|strong="G1161"\w* \w there|strong="G1161"\w* \w arose|strong="G1096"\w* \w a|strong="G1096"\w* \w great|strong="G4183"\w* dissension, \w the|strong="G3588"\w* tribune \w fearing|strong="G5399"\w* \w lest|strong="G3361"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w* should \w be|strong="G1096"\w* pulled \w in|strong="G1519"\w* \w pieces|strong="G1288"\w* \w by|strong="G5259"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \w commanded|strong="G2753"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w soldiers|strong="G4753"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w go|strong="G2597"\w* \w down|strong="G2597"\w*, \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w take|strong="G1096"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w by|strong="G5259"\w* \w force|strong="G0726"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* \w among|strong="G1537"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w bring|strong="G0071"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* castle.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w night|strong="G3571"\w* following \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w standing|strong="G2186"\w* \w by|strong="G3004"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w said|strong="G3004"\w*: \w Be|strong="G1163"\w* constant; \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* thou hast \w testified|strong="G3140"\w* \w of|strong="G2962"\w* \w me|strong="G3004"\w* \w in|strong="G1519"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="G2419"\w*, \w so|strong="G2532"\w* \w must|strong="G1163"\w* thou \w bear|strong="G3140"\w* \w witness|strong="G3140"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w at|strong="G1519"\w* \w Rome|strong="G4516"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w when|strong="G1161"\w* \w day|strong="G2250"\w* \w was|strong="G3739"\w* \w come|strong="G1096"\w*, \w some|strong="G3588"\w* \w of|strong="G2250"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w* gathered together, \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w bound|strong="G0332"\w* \w themselves|strong="G1438"\w* \w under|strong="G0332"\w* \w a|strong="G1096"\w* \w curse|strong="G0332"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \w that|strong="G3739"\w* \w they|strong="G3739"\w* \w would|strong="G1096"\w* \w neither|strong="G3383"\w* \w eat|strong="G2068"\w*, \w nor|strong="G3383"\w* \w drink|strong="G4095"\w*, till \w they|strong="G3739"\w* \w killed|strong="G0615"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w they|strong="G1161"\w* \w were|strong="G1510"\w* \w more|strong="G4183"\w* \w than|strong="G4183"\w* \w forty|strong="G5062"\w* \w men|strong="G3778"\w* \w that|strong="G3778"\w* \w had|strong="G1510"\w* \w made|strong="G4160"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w conspiracy|strong="G4160"\w*.

\w Who|strong="G3739"\w* \w came|strong="G4334"\w* \w to|strong="G3004"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w chief|strong="G0749"\w* \w priests|strong="G0749"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* ancients, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w*: \w We|strong="G3739"\w* \w have|strong="G2532"\w* \w bound|strong="G0332"\w* \w ourselves|strong="G1438"\w* \w under|strong="G0332"\w* \w a|strong="G3739"\w* great \w curse|strong="G0332"\w* \w that|strong="G3739"\w* \w we|strong="G3739"\w* \w will|strong="G3739"\w* \w eat|strong="G1089"\w* \w nothing|strong="G3367"\w* till \w we|strong="G3739"\w* \w have|strong="G2532"\w* slain \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w*.

\w Now|strong="G1161"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* \w do|strong="G1510"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w with|strong="G4862"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w council|strong="G4892"\w* signify \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* tribune, \w that|strong="G3704"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* \w bring|strong="G2609"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* forth \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w*, \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w if|strong="G5613"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w meant|strong="G1510"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* know \w something|strong="G1510"\w* more certain touching \w him|strong="G0846"\w*. \w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w*, \w before|strong="G4253"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* \w come|strong="G3195"\w* \w near|strong="G1448"\w*, \w are|strong="G1510"\w* \w ready|strong="G2092"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w kill|strong="G0337"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w Which|strong="G3588"\w* \w when|strong="G2532"\w* \w Paul’s|strong="G3972"\w* sister’s \w son|strong="G5207"\w* \w had|strong="G3972"\w* \w heard|strong="G0191"\w*, \w of|strong="G5207"\w* \w their|strong="G2532"\w* lying \w in|strong="G1519"\w* wait, \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w came|strong="G3854"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w entered|strong="G1525"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* castle \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w told|strong="G0518"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w*, \w calling|strong="G4341"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w of|strong="G1520"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w centurions|strong="G1543"\w*, \w said|strong="G5346"\w*: Bring \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w young|strong="G3494"\w* \w man|strong="G3778"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* tribune, \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* hath \w some|strong="G5100"\w* \w thing|strong="G3778"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w tell|strong="G0518"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w taking|strong="G0071"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w brought|strong="G0071"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* tribune, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G5346"\w*: \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w*, \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w prisoner|strong="G1198"\w*, desired \w me|strong="G1473"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w bring|strong="G0071"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w young|strong="G3495"\w* \w man|strong="G3778"\w* unto thee, \w who|strong="G3588"\w* hath \w some|strong="G5100"\w* \w thing|strong="G3778"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w say|strong="G2980"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* thee.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* tribune \w taking|strong="G1949"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w by|strong="G2596"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w hand|strong="G5495"\w*, \w went|strong="G0402"\w* \w aside|strong="G0402"\w* \w with|strong="G2596"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w privately|strong="G2596"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w asked|strong="G4441"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*: \w What|strong="G5101"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w it|strong="G0846"\w* \w that|strong="G3739"\w* thou hast \w to|strong="G2596"\w* \w tell|strong="G0518"\w* \w me|strong="G1473"\w*?

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w*: \w The|strong="G3588"\w* \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w* \w have|strong="G3748"\w* \w agreed|strong="G4934"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* desire thee, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* thou wouldst \w bring|strong="G2609"\w* forth \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w* \w tomorrow|strong="G0839"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w council|strong="G4892"\w*, \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w if|strong="G5613"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* \w meant|strong="G3004"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w inquire|strong="G4441"\w* \w some|strong="G5100"\w* \w thing|strong="G0846"\w* more \w certain|strong="G5100"\w* touching \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w But|strong="G2532"\w* \w do|strong="G1510"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* thou give credit \w to|strong="G2193"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*; \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w there|strong="G1510"\w* lie \w in|strong="G2532"\w* \w wait|strong="G1748"\w* \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w more|strong="G4183"\w* \w than|strong="G4183"\w* \w forty|strong="G5062"\w* \w men|strong="G0435"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \w who|strong="G3739"\w* \w have|strong="G1510"\w* \w bound|strong="G0332"\w* \w themselves|strong="G1438"\w* \w by|strong="G1537"\w* \w oath|strong="G0332"\w* \w neither|strong="G3383"\w* \w to|strong="G2193"\w* \w eat|strong="G2068"\w*, \w nor|strong="G3383"\w* \w to|strong="G2193"\w* \w drink|strong="G4095"\w*, till \w they|strong="G0846"\w* \w have|strong="G1510"\w* \w killed|strong="G0337"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* \w are|strong="G1510"\w* \w now|strong="G3568"\w* \w ready|strong="G2092"\w*, \w looking|strong="G4327"\w* \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w a|strong="G1510"\w* \w promise|strong="G1860"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* thee.

\w The|strong="G3588"\w* tribune \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* \w dismissed|strong="G0630"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w young|strong="G3495"\w* \w man|strong="G3778"\w*, charging \w him|strong="G4314"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w he|strong="G3778"\w* \w should|strong="G3778"\w* \w tell|strong="G1583"\w* \w no|strong="G3367"\w* \w man|strong="G3778"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w he|strong="G3778"\w* \w had|strong="G3748"\w* made known \w these|strong="G3778"\w* \w things|strong="G3778"\w* unto \w him|strong="G4314"\w*.

\w Then|strong="G2532"\w* having \w called|strong="G3004"\w* \w two|strong="G1417"\w* \w centurions|strong="G1543"\w*, \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* \w to|strong="G3004"\w* \w them|strong="G3004"\w*: \w Make|strong="G2090"\w* \w ready|strong="G2090"\w* \w two|strong="G1417"\w* \w hundred|strong="G1250"\w* \w soldiers|strong="G4757"\w* \w to|strong="G3004"\w* \w go|strong="G4198"\w* \w as|strong="G4198"\w* \w far|strong="G2193"\w* \w as|strong="G4198"\w* \w Caesarea|strong="G2542"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w seventy|strong="G1440"\w* \w horsemen|strong="G2460"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w two|strong="G1417"\w* \w hundred|strong="G1250"\w* \w spearmen|strong="G1187"\w* \w for|strong="G0575"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w third|strong="G5154"\w* \w hour|strong="G5610"\w* \w of|strong="G0575"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w night|strong="G3571"\w*:

\w And|strong="G5037"\w* \w provide|strong="G3936"\w* \w beasts|strong="G2934"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w they|strong="G3972"\w* \w may|strong="G2443"\w* set \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w* \w on|strong="G3972"\w*, \w and|strong="G5037"\w* \w bring|strong="G1295"\w* \w him|strong="G4314"\w* safe \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w Felix|strong="G5344"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w governor|strong="G2232"\w*.

(\w For|strong="G3778"\w* \w he|strong="G3778"\w* feared lest perhaps \w the|strong="G3588"\w* Jews might \w take|strong="G2192"\w* \w him|strong="G1125"\w* away \w by|strong="G2192"\w* force \w and|strong="G2192"\w* kill \w him|strong="G1125"\w*, \w and|strong="G2192"\w* \w he|strong="G3778"\w* \w should|strong="G3778"\w* afterwards \w be|strong="G2192"\w* slandered, \w as|strong="G1125"\w* if \w he|strong="G3778"\w* \w was|strong="G3588"\w* \w to|strong="G3778"\w* \w take|strong="G2192"\w* money.) \w And|strong="G2192"\w* \w he|strong="G3778"\w* \w wrote|strong="G1125"\w* \w a|strong="G2192"\w* \w letter|strong="G1992"\w* after \w this|strong="G3778"\w* manner:

\w Claudius|strong="G2804"\w* \w Lysias|strong="G3079"\w* \w to|strong="G3588"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w most|strong="G2903"\w* \w excellent|strong="G2903"\w* \w governor|strong="G2232"\w*, \w Felix|strong="G5344"\w*, \w greeting|strong="G5463"\w*.
